title: Nitrogen use efficiency of open-pollinated maize cultivars and topcrosses under low nitrogen soil
content:
Publication date: 30 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 20

Author(s): Sunday Ayodele Ige, Bashir Omolaran Bello, Jimoh Mahamood, Michael Afolabi, Charity Aremu, Stephen Abolusoro, Solomon Oyekale, Favour Chijioke
